name: IRCCloud SASL Username not Nick Workaround
description: Workaround for users with SASL name != Nickserv Identification. 🚨 WARNING: scheduler not fully configured when deployed! Read README for details. 🚨

IRC_SERVER_IRCCLOUD_NETWORK_NAME.description: The network name as seen in the IRCCloud GUI. Eg. Rizon, Secret Server, Freenet, OFTC

IRC_SERVER_IRCCLOUD_SASL_NAME.description: The username to use for SASL authentication. Eg. user(21232)

IRC_SERVER_IRCCLOUD_NICK_NAME.description: The nickname you want to use after SASL is authentication. Eg. xXxDongSmasherVegeta420xXx
